property.name: query
property.value: insert into xeai_audit_log (audit_time, endpoint, severity, payload, audit_param, xeai_id, correlation_id, event_name, audit_type) values (to_timestamp( ?,'mm-dd-yyyy hh24:mi:ss.ms'), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

property.name: query
property.value: select audit_param, audit_correlation, audit_config, audit_type from xeai_audit_log_config where audit_event = ? and audit_key = ? and audit_level = ?
